item.title: Matrix 718/742 Command Logs
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

You will need to convert variables/paths most likely(don’t know anything about higher revisions)

[code=java]public void writeCommandLog(String command)
{
checkDateAndTime();
String filePath = “./Data/Commands2.txt”;
BufferedWriter bw = null;

	try 
	{				
		bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(filePath, true));
		bw.write("[" + c.date + "]" + "-" + "[" + c.currentTime + " " + checkTimeOfDay() + "]: " 
			+ "[" + c.playerName + "]: " + "[" + c.connectedFrom + "] "
			 +  "::" + command);
		bw.newLine();
		bw.flush();
	} 
	catch (IOException ioe) 
	{
		ioe.printStackTrace();
	} 
	finally 
	{
		if (bw != null)
		{
			try 
			{
				bw.close();
			} 
			catch (IOException ioe2) 
			{
			}
		}
	}
}[/code]

then just make the folder wherever you want the path to be.

Read full topic
